articles.author: PTI
articles.title: LTTS to hire over 1000 engineers for its new Mysuru campus - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The new 'Module X' campus has a capacity to seat over 1300 engineers who will be working on high-end projects for LTTS' global clientele, the company said.
articles.content: The new 'Module X' campus has a capacity to seat over 1300 engineers who will be working on high-end projects for LTTS' global clientele, the company said.

articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: No more queues, use WhatsApp to purchase Namma Metro tickets in Bengaluru - The Indian Express
articles.description: The BMRCL said Namma Metro is the first transit service in the world to introduce an end-to-end ticketing system on WhatsApp.
articles.content: Namma Metro passengers in Bengaluru can now use WhatsApp to purchase train tickets and recharge travel passes. The Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Limited (BMRCL) has announced that the chatbot-base… [+1956 chars]
